verses.name: Ezekiel 6:5
verses.text: And I will lay the dead carcases of the children of Israel before their idols; and I will scatter your bones round about your altars.

verses.name: Ezekiel 6:6
verses.text: In all your dwellingplaces the cities shall be laid waste, and the high places shall be desolate; that your altars may be laid waste and made desolate, and your idols may be broken and cease, and your images may be cut down, and your works may be abolished.

verses.name: Ezekiel 6:7
verses.text: And the slain shall fall in the midst of you, and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
